question: Rosemary DiCarlo become the first female Political Chief of this country.
explanation: Rosemary DiCarlo was named UN Political Chief, becoming the first female UN Political Chief. eplaces Jeffrey Feltman. Rosemary DiCarlo is a former deputy US ambassador to the United Nations. She was also deputy assistant secretary of state for European and Eurasian affairs and director for United Nations affairs at the national security council in Washington. She has been the president of the National Committee on American Foreign Policy since 2015. Her areas of expertise are Russia, former Soviet Union and the Middle East. She speaks Russian and French.
